ComicInfo.Summary: Embedded: Behind Enemy Lines Part Six: Ben and Sally watch the final battle between Sentry and the Hulk. After the dust has cleared, they try to make some sense out of the massive destruction to the city World War Hulk has caused. Sally gives a very special message to Daredevil. Sally discovers that the secret financial backer for Front Line has actually been J. Jonah Jameson all along and confronts him about it.
ComicInfo.Title: Embedded: Behind Enemy Lines Part Six
